messages.message: Hi turkey, how do you feel about your neighbors and playing turkey in general? Once you break through the Balkans and blow past 4 supply centers you can have an explosive game for sure
messages.input: Message from FRANCE:'Hi turkey, how do you feel about your neighbors and playing turkey in general? Once you break through the Balkans and blow past 4 supply centers you can have an explosive game for sure'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F ANK - BLA, A SMY - CON, A CON - BUL. Should I trust FRANCE?
messages.output: You should not trust the message from FRANCE. Their message appears overly friendly and encouraging, possibly trying to manipulate you into focusing on other regions while they make moves against you in the Balkans. Be cautious and prioritize securing your borders instead of blindly believing in potential alliances offered by neighbors.
